repository.corpname: University of Tennessee Libraries, Special Collections

did.abstract: A scrapbook put together by Mrs. P. S. Rothrock comprised of letters, newspaper articles, and photographs relating to her organization out of North Carolina, Children of Confederacy, an auxiliary association of the Daughters of the Confederacy. The dates noted in the scrapbook fall between 1917 and 1934.
did.langmaterial: This material is written in English.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: No biographical information is available for this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents Note
scopecontent.p: A scrapbook put together by Mrs. P. S. Rothrock comprised of letters, newspaper articles, and photographs relating to her organization out of North Carolina, Children of Confederacy, an auxiliary association of the Daughters of the Confederacy. The dates noted in the scrapbook fall between 1917 and 1934. The documents within the scrapbook contain information both directly pertaining to the organization as well as articles of the time relating to the Civil War, specifically Confederate history, from local sources in several North Carolina towns.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collections are stored offsite, and a minimum of 24 hours is needed to retrieve these items for use. Researchers interested in consulting any of the collections are advised to contact Special Collections.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection remain with the creator. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library.
